traditional_chinese: 前端開發者實施了響應式設計以提供更好的用戶體驗。

full_sentence: The QA team conducts automated tests on daily builds to find bugs
traditional_chinese: QA團隊對每日構建進行自動測試以查找錯誤。

full_sentence: The Scrum Master organizes daily stand-ups to keep track of team progress
traditional_chinese: Scrum Master組織每日站會以追踪團隊進度。

full_sentence: Our cloud architect designs infrastructure solutions for scalability and reliability
traditional_chinese: 我們的雲架構師設計基礎設施解決方案以實現可擴展性和可靠性。

full_sentence: The security analyst identifies potential vulnerabilities through regular penetration testing
traditional_chinese: 安全分析師通過定期的滲透測試識別潛在的漏洞。

full_sentence: The hiring manager values cultural fit as much as technical competence
traditional_chinese: 招聘經理認為文化適應性與技術能力同樣重要。

full_sentence: DevOps engineers prioritize continuous integration in the software development lifecycle
traditional_chinese: DevOps工程師在軟件開發生命週期中將持續集成作為優先事項。

full_sentence: The UX designer emphasizes user feedback for iterative improvement of the interface
traditional_chinese: UX設計師強調用戶反饋以迭代改進界面。

full_sentence: The mobile developer has expertise in both iOS and Android platforms
traditional_chinese: 這位手機開發者在iOS和Android平台上都有專業知識。

full_sentence: Cybersecurity experts advise regular updates to guard against potential threats
traditional_chinese: 網絡安全專家建議定期更新以防範潛在威脅。

full_sentence: The hardware specialist recommends upgrades based on performance metrics
traditional_chinese: 硬件專家根據性能指標推薦升級。

full_sentence: The cybersecurity expert monitors network traffic for suspicious activities
traditional_chinese: 網絡安全專家監控網絡流量以尋找可疑活動。

full_sentence: Developers adopt Agile methodologies to increase flexibility and responsiveness
traditional_chinese: 開發者採用敏捷方法以增加靈活性和響應性。

full_sentence: The IT manager oversees network operations to maintain optimal performance
traditional_chinese: IT經理監督網絡運營以維持最佳性能。

full_sentence: The software architect designs modular components for easy integration and maintenance
traditional_chinese: 軟件架構師設計模塊化組件以便於集成和維護。

full_sentence: Systems analysts evaluate hardware compatibility before procuring new equipment
traditional_chinese: 系統分析師在購買新設備之前評估硬件兼容性。

full_sentence: The IT recruiter looks for candidates with up-to-date skills and certifications
traditional_chinese: IT招聘人員尋找擁有最新技能和認證的候選人。

full_sentence: Web developers optimize website loading times by compressing media assets
traditional_chinese: 網頁開發者通過壓縮媒體資源優化網站加載時間。

full_sentence: The system administrator configures firewall rules to protect against unauthorized access
traditional_chinese: 系統管理員配置防火牆規則以防止未經授權的訪問。

full_sentence: The network engineer sets up VPN connections for remote work access
